Description.Text: Located on the east side of Midtown Manhattan, this recently renovated Courtyard by Marriott is in a 31-story building between 52nd and 53rd streets. Rockefeller Center and Fifth Avenue stores are four blocks west. Bloomingdale’s is less than seven blocks north, and Central Park is an 11-block stroll. The Lexington Avenue subway station, a half-block away, provides convenient connections to other parts of New York City.

• Sony Wonder Technology Lab - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi • Dahesh Museum - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi • St. Patrick's Cathedral - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi • American Girl Place - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi • Museum of Modern Art - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi • Rockefeller Plaza - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi • Chrysler Building - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi • Grand Central Terminal - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi • Broadway - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi • Times Square - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi • Empire State Building - 1.6 km / 1 mi • Central Park - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi • Brooklyn Bridge - 6.3 km / 3.9 mi • Ellis Island - 8.8 km / 5.5 mi • Statue of Liberty - 9.9 km / 6.1 mi

• NYC hotel Midtown rooms with iron/ironing board & hair dryer. Refrigerator available on request. • Satellite TV 37" Flat Screen TV's & in-room movies available in our NYC hotel in Midtown East NYC. • Our NYC hotel Midtown has spacious hotel rooms with huge windows boasting great views of Midtown NY. • Cotton-rich linens, thicker mattresses & fluffier pillows in our NY hotel Midtown guest rooms. • Complimentary high speed Internet access to stay connected from your NYC hotel Midtown room. • Large work desk with no-glare lighting, 2 line phones w/ data ports & voicemail, & ergonomic chair. • This hotel has a smoke-free policy

Boasting guestrooms all at a minimum 330 square feet in size, this hotel is a great choice for travelers seeking room to spread out in a central location. The lobby is on the 12th floor, above various offices, and rooms begin on the 14th floor. The hotel is four blocks west of Rockefeller Center, home to the 70th-floor "Top of the Rock" observation deck with spectacular city views. Fifth Avenue shopping is also four blocks away. • Total 20 floors, 308 rooms, 4 suites • 4 meeting rooms, 1,500 sq ft of total meeting space
Check-in: 4:00 pm Check-out: 12:00 pm Pets not allowed

From La Guardia Airport - LGA: Take Grand Central Pkwy West to Triboro Bridge, cross over bridge and take FDR Drive Sourth to exit 49th St. Continue on 49th St., turn right on 3rd Ave. From JF Kennedy - JFK: Take Van Wyck Expwy into Grand Central Pkwy to 495 Long Island Expressway into Queens Midtown Tunnel. Exit at 37th St. and 3rd Ave.

On-site: East Side Cafe (American) Open for breakfast Restaurants Nearby: • Sherwood Restaurant (0.2 miles) • Ray Bari Pizza (0.2 miles) • Pig 'n' Whistle (0.2 miles) • Luna Piena • Mama Mexico • Smith and Wollensky (0.3 miles) • Outback Steakhouse • San Martin • Oceana • Dos Caminos • Megu • Europa Cafe • Nevada Smiths (2 miles) • Lunasa Bar and Lounge (3 miles)

NEWLY RENOVATED GUEST ROOMS AND SUITES - offering fresh new amenities in a warm and welcoming environment. Located in Manhattan's prestigious East Side, with spacious guest rooms within walking distance to Midtown Manhattan's business district.
